description:
WhaleGiveaway2.redeem() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3f2ef511aa6e75231e4deafc7a3d2ecab3741de2.sol#21-29) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3f2ef511aa6e75231e4deafc7a3d2ecab3741de2.sol#27)

WhaleGiveaway2.Command(address,bytes) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3f2ef511aa6e75231e4deafc7a3d2ecab3741de2.sol#39-46) ignores return value by adr.call.value(msg.value)(data) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3f2ef511aa6e75231e4deafc7a3d2ecab3741de2.sol#45)
